lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.common

Class RemoteControllableServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.common.RemoteControllableServer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BookieServer, GamblerServer

    public class RemoteControllableServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for a JSON-RPC server that can be controlled remotely. A method is exported allowing to invoke an arbitrary command.
    Author:
    steffen

    • Method Detail

      • invokeCommand

        public void invokeCommand(java.lang.String command)
        Locally invoke a command that is received from a remote site. This effectively enables to remote control the application.
        Parameters:
        command - command to be invoked
